creditline:
Bequest of Mrs. Olive E. Gilbert

per card cat.
description:
gold and emamel figure of a white spaniel with brown markings, the golden ears hung with two baroque pearls, cracked, the eyes and tail inset with small rubies, the collar a circlet of tiny rose diamonds; gold chain suspension

pendant dog, porcelain, gold, 2 pearls, rubies, gold chain
title: Pendant dog
